background: A navy ship is preparing meals to ensure sufficient vitamin and fibre intake for their staff, using only salads and fruit bowls.

parameters.definition: Minimum units of vitamin intake required per staff
Minimum units of fibre intake required per staff
Units of vitamins in one salad
Units of fibre in one salad
Units of vitamins in one fruit bowl
Units of fibre in one fruit bowl
Maximum proportion of meals that can be fruit bowls
Units of potassium in one salad
Units of potassium in one fruit bowl

constraints.description: Each staff must receive at least V units of vitamins, which is provided by salads and fruit bowls.
constraints.code:
# Add vitamin intake constraint
model.addConstr(VSalad * NumberOfSalads + VFruitBowl * NumberOfFruitBowls >= V, name="vitamin_intake_constraint")

constraints.description: Ensure each staff receives at least F units of fibre.
constraints.code:
# Add minimum fibre intake constraint
model.addConstr(NumberOfSalads * FSalad + NumberOfFruitBowls * FFruitBowl >= F * S, name="minimum_fibre_intake")

constraints.description: Each staff is limited to a maximum proportion of MaxFruitBowlProportion of their total meals as fruit bowls.
constraints.code:
# Add constraint to limit fruit bowls proportion
model.addConstr(
    NumberOfFruitBowls <= (MaxFruitBowlProportion / (1 - MaxFruitBowlProportion)) * NumberOfSalads,
    name="max_fruit_bowl_proportion"
)

constraints.description: The total number of salads prepared must be non-negative.
constraints.code:
# Add non-negativity constraint for the total number of salads
model.addConstr(NumberOfSalads >= 0, name="non_negative_salads")

constraints.description: Ensure the number of fruit bowls prepared for each staff member is non-negative.
constraints.code:
# Add constraint to ensure the number of fruit bowls is non-negative
model.addConstr(NumberOfFruitBowls >= 0, name="non_negative_fruit_bowls")

constraints.description: Each staff must meet the minimum vitamin intake requirement.
constraints.code:
# Add vitamin intake constraints
model.addConstr(VSalad * NumberOfSalads + VFruitBowl * NumberOfFruitBowls >= S * V, name="min_vitamin_intake")

constraints.description: Each staff must meet the minimum fibre intake requirement.
constraints.code:
# Add constraint to meet the minimum fibre intake requirement per staff
model.addConstr(FSalad * NumberOfSalads + FFruitBowl * NumberOfFruitBowls >= S * F, name="fibre_intake_requirement")

constraints.description: The total number of meals is the sum of salads and fruit bowls.
constraints.code:
# Add constraint for total meals to be equal to the sum of salads and fruit bowls
model.addConstr(TotalMeals == NumberOfSalads + NumberOfFruitBowls, name="total_meals_constraint")

constraints.description: The number of fruit bowls cannot exceed the maximum proportion of the total meals.
constraints.code:
# Add constraint for the maximum proportion of fruit bowls
model.addConstr(NumberOfFruitBowls <= MaxFruitBowlProportion * TotalMeals, name="max_fruit_bowl_proportion")

variables.definition: The total number of salads consumed.
The total number of fruit bowls consumed.
The total number of staff on the navy ship.
The total number of meals consumed.

objective.description: Maximize the total potassium intake from salads and fruit bowls for all staff.
objective.code:
# Set objective
model.setObjective(KSalad * NumberOfSalads + KFruitBowl * NumberOfFruitBowls, gp.GRB.MAXIMIZE)
